General_Description: '''Hoplites of Chaos''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: On a [[message board]], Kassandra found a note about a contract: "[[Sparta]]n [[Hoplite]]s play a key role in [[Spartan army|their forces]]. Taking them out will cripple Sparta."
Section_Outcome: Kassandra sought out and slew a number of Spartan hoplites all over [[Greece]], gaining rewards for doing this.
Section_Behind_the_scenes: This very same contract appears also under the names [[Spartan Orders]] and [[Target of Choice - Spartan Hoplites]].
